[color=tomato][u][b]What's New in AVG Anti-Virus Professional Edition 2013 :[/b][/u][/color]

[color=turquoise]Ã‚Â· AvgSys: Fixed issue with blocked scanning launch on file systems with limited capabilities.
Ã‚Â· Core: Fixed issue with crash while scanning corrupted *.chm file.
Ã‚Â· E-mail Scanner: Fixed IMAP parsing problem.

Ã‚Â· Setup: Decreased disk space requirements for backup of setup files.

Ã‚Â· Toolbar: New version of toolbar implemented.

Ã‚Â· Update: Fixed issue with update fail caused by processing of flags received from update server.[/color][/size]
